Name: _version_
Documentation: string values describing the version of VM and compiler.

Name: _charsize_
Documentation: size in bytes of the internal VM rapresentation for characters(1 for ASCII builds 2 for UNICODE builds).

Name: _intsize_
Documentation: size in bytes of the internal VM rapresentation for integers(4 for 32bits builds 8 for 64bits builds).

Name: _floatsize_
Documentation: size in bytes of the internal VM rapresentation for floats(4 for single precision builds 8 for double precision builds).
